Rules are important

There are three important rules you should know:

  • Rock beats Scissors
  • Scissors cut Papper
  • Papper wrap Rock

Intresting fact

In some variations of the game, the winner of each round "uses" the weapon on the opponent's weapon, to demonstrate that they have won.

May the best man win!Good luck!
